document_data.caption: A map showing Ignorance Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Ignorance Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Ignorance Alley''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Ignorance Alley was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] just south of [[Bliss Street]]. It branched east from [[Westwall Street]] and ended on the western curve of [[Ivory Street]] after passing several buildings. [[Seawatch Street]] branched south from Ignorance Alley's midpoint.
